notes: Mykonos. Member of Leading Hotels of the World and Querido Hotels. Home to Matsuhisa Mykonos restaurant. Very active press page. Marketing email handles press and influencer inquiries. 31K Instagram followers.

Mykonos. Arguably the most Instagram-famous hotel on Mykonos — 2.1M followers. Has hosted major influencers. Social media managed by Vivre Agency. Direct contact via reservations email; ask for PR/marketing or reach Vivre Agency for influencer collabs.

Mykonos. Iconic beach club and lifestyle brand at Paraga Beach. Dedicated press@ email. Also: events.mykonos@scorpios.com and bookings.mykonos@scorpios.com. Strong influencer culture — music, wellness, culinary programming. One of the top social-media venues in the Mediterranean.
Mykonos. Luxury boutique hotel repped by J/PR (jpublicrelations.com) for influencer and media collaborations. J/PR is a top luxury hospitality PR firm. Has a dedicated press page on site.

brand_name: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort
notes: Mykonos (Ornos Bay). Part of Marriott's Luxury Collection. 66.5K Instagram followers. Actively open to influencer ambassador roles, content retainer models, and affiliate partnerships. Standard email format is first.last@santa-marina.gr.

Mykonos. Member of Design Hotels and part of Louis Hotels. Boutique hotel in Mykonos Town. Design Hotels membership provides additional PR network access. Contact general email and ask for marketing/PR department.

Santorini. Multiple properties in Oia. Also: andronis@jpublicrelations.com for PR inquiries (J/PR handles their publicity). Full collection includes Andronis Boutique Hotel, Andronis Arcadia, Andronis Luxury Suites. Top-tier influencer magnet property.

Santorini. Multiple properties: Katikies Hotel, Kirini, Garden, Chromata, and Mykonos properties. Dedicated press@ email. Individual property emails: katikiessantorini@katikies.com, kirinisantorini@katikies.com. Featured extensively in luxury travel press. Strong social-media presence.

Santorini. Multiple properties: Canaves Oia Hotel, Suites, Villa, Epitome. Dedicated pr@ email specifically for travel bloggers and influencers. Also: info@canaves.com, sales@canaves.com. One of Santorini's most photographed hotel collections.

Santorini. Luxury adults-only boutique cave hotel in Imerovigli. Dedicated press@ email for journalists and influencers. Active press page showcasing media features. Caldera-view rooms perfect for travel content.

brand_name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
notes: Santorini. Part of Auberge Resorts Collection. 56K Instagram followers. Known for spectacular caldera views and high-end influencer stays. Contact via hotel email or reach Auberge Resorts corporate communications for influencer/media inquiries.

Ibiza. Dedicated influencer/collab contact via PR agency Kit & Kaboodle. Offers hospitality to influencers in exchange for social media coverage. Dedicated press page at obeachibiza.com/press. Top-tier Ibiza day club.

Ibiza. Dedicated collaborations page at ibizarocks.com/collaborations/. Actively seeking influencers for summer season. Offers entry, VIP spaces, and perks in exchange for Instagram/TikTok/YouTube/blog coverage. Focused on music and lifestyle content.

Ibiza. Global press@ email for all Nikki Beach properties. Ibiza-specific: info.ibiza@nikkibeach.com. Business development: businessdevelopment@nikkibeach.com. World-famous beach club and resort brand — very influencer-active.

Ibiza. Six Senses flagship European property. PR contacts listed at sixsenses.com/en/corporate/media-center/global-pr-contacts/. Marketing team manages influencer partnerships, activations, and events. Also reach via Six Senses corporate media center.

brand_name: Caruso, A Belmond Hotel, Amalfi Coast
notes: Amalfi Coast. Direct hotel PR contact Emilia Filocamo. Also: Laura Di Bert (Italy/Spain/Portugal Director of PR): laura.dibert@belmond.com. Belmond global: ottavia.palomba@belmond.com (Head of Brand Communications). PR agency: belmond@petriepr.com (Petrie PR).

Amalfi Coast / Positano. 519K Instagram followers — one of the most-followed boutique hotels globally. PR represented by A R T Communication (Anna Rosa Thomae, annarosathomae.com). General: info@sirenuse.it, Tel: +39 089 875066.

Amalfi Coast. Clifftop boutique hotel with Michelin-starred restaurant. Sales/marketing email for partnership inquiries. Also: reservations@casangelina.com, info@casangelina.com. Dedicated press page on site. Announced 2026 season re-opening with new programming.

Amalfi Coast. 157K Instagram followers. UK PR: Shirley Brooke, GP Associates, shirley@gp-associates.co.uk. US PR: Wendy Wegner, Information@wegnerinc.com. Hotel general: info@monasterosantarosa.com. Press and awards page on website.

Amalfi Coast. Legendary 5-star cliff hotel. Relais & Chateaux member. Contact GM directly: gm@ilsanpietro.it or andrea.zana@ilsanpietro.it. General: info@ilsanpietro.it. Strong luxury travel press presence.

Lake Como (Italian Lakes). One of the world's most iconic grand hotels. Dedicated PR/Communications email. Press area at villadeste.com/press-area. Member of Leading Hotels of the World. Extraordinarily visual property — ideal for content creators.

Puglia / Italian coast. World-famous resort (G7 was hosted here). Active press page at borgoegnazia.com/press. General email for initial contact; ask to be directed to PR/marketing. Strong influencer and luxury travel media relationships.

Sicily / Italian coast. Part of Rocco Forte Hotels. Group PR portal: press.roccofortehotels.com. Events: events.verdura@roccofortehotels.com. Corporate PR director Natalie Rucellai is primary media contact for all Rocco Forte properties.

French Riviera (Antibes/Cap d'Antibes). One of the world's most iconic luxury hotels. Oetker Collection. Regional Head of Communications: valerie.muller@oetkerhotels.com. UK PR: julia@perowne.com (Perowne International). General reservations: reservations.hdcer@oetkerhotels.com.

French Riviera (Eze). Exclusive private-peninsula hotel with dedicated press access page at capestel.com/en/press-information/press.html. General contact: contact@capestel.com, +33 (0)4 93 76 29 29. Highly visual, social-media friendly cliffside property.

French Riviera (Cannes). Part of Hyatt's Unbound Collection. Art Deco icon on the Croisette. PR managed by Spotlight Communications who ran dedicated influencer campaigns for the hotel. Communication email for direct press outreach.

brand_name: InterContinental Carlton Cannes (Regent Hotel by IHG)
notes: French Riviera (Cannes). Iconic Croisette hotel now Regent by IHG. Direct communications contact: Laura Lefrançois, carlton.communication@ihg.com, +33 (0) 4 93 06 40 55. PR agency: Michael Torino-Gardie, Melchior Agency, michael@agencemelchior.com. Press kit available.

French Riviera (Saint-Tropez). Historic 5-star hotel, member of Leading Hotels of the World. UK PR: Victoria Henson at Sekoya Communications, v.henson@sekoyacomms.com. CEO: Christophe Chauvin, cchauvin@byblos.com. Dedicated press & partners page on site.

brand_name: Terre Blanche Hotel Spa Golf Resort
notes: Provence / French Riviera. 5-star resort & spa. Member of Leading Hotels of the World. UK PR: Sekoya Communications, terre-blanche@sekoyacomms.com, +44 (0)20 3980 9500. Internal contact: Marion Para, mparra@terre-blanche.com. Active media partnerships.

Monaco. Flagship luxury resort on the Côte d'Azur. General contact: montecarlo@fairmont.com. Events: fmc.grandevents@fairmont.com. Tracked by The Handbook for influencer connections. Actively uses influencer campaigns. Fairmont global influencer form at press.fourseasons.com.

Multiple luxury all-inclusive resorts in Greece (Halkidiki, Corfu, Crete, Kos, Kefalonia) and Spain (Marbella, Ibiza). DACH PR: ikos@wilde.de (Wilde & Partner). General: info@ikosresorts.com. Large social media presence. Excellent for reach-wealthy-families + couples content.

Greece (Halkidiki). Flagship property of Sani/Ikos Group. 268K Instagram followers. Communications Director Fanis Kromidas on LinkedIn. PR handled through MMGY Grifco. General contact via site for press/influencer inquiries.

Greece (Peloponnese). Costa Navarino explicitly bills W Costa Navarino as 'the ultimate influencer hotspot' on their own website. Media page: costanavarino.com/media/. Sales & Marketing office for press inquiries. Also Violetta Stani (PR/Communications at Mandarin Oriental Costa Navarino) via LinkedIn.

Greece (multiple). Large luxury hotel group including Grecotel Corfu Imperial (Corfu) and luxury Crete properties. Dedicated press contacts page at grecotel.com/contact-us/press-contacts.html. International media: media@grecotel.com. Greek media: press@grecotel.com.

Croatia (Dubrovnik). Collection of seaside hotels and villas in Dubrovnik. Dedicated media section at adriaticluxuryhotels.com/media/. Encourages users to tag @adriaticluxuryhotels and use #ALHhotels. General: +385 20300350, Masarykov put 20, Dubrovnik.

Croatia (Dubrovnik area). Member of Leading Hotels of the World. Email: info@sungardensdubrovnik.com. Phone: +385 (0)20 361 500. Standard email format: first.last@sungardensdubrovnik.com. Beautiful Adriatic-facing resort ideal for travel content.

Croatia (Hvar). Portfolio of luxury hotels on Hvar island including Palace Elisabeth. Reservations: reservations@suncanihvar.com. CEO Goran Kovacevic: g.kovacevic@suncanihvar.hr. Concierge: concierge@suncanihvar.com. Hvar is a prime Adriatic influencer destination.

brand_name: Aman (Global — press for Venice, Amanzoe, etc.)
notes: Ultra-luxury brand with European properties including Aman Venice (@aman_venice) and Amanzoe (Porto Heli, Greece — reopens April 2026). Global press: press@aman.com. London office: london@aman.com. All inquiries routed through central press team.

Ultra-luxury collection including San Clemente Palace Venice (managed by MO since mid-2025) and Mandarin Oriental Costa Navarino. Press: press.mandarinoriental.com. Global PR press contact via corlikowski@mohg.com. Also partnered with FINN Partners (North America) and PEPR Agency.

Mykonos. Boutique luxury hotel at Psarou Beach. PR handled by PR Media Co. Contacts: phoebe@prmediaco.com and jack@prmediaco.com. Press room at kensho-psarou.prmediaco.com. Sister property: Kenshō Ornos (info@kenshomykonos.com).

Mallorca (Spain). Cliffside luxury hotel with dramatic sea views. Jumeirah corporate press/PR also via jumeirah@talesandheads.com (Dubai-based PR network). Active Instagram. Ideal for Mediterranean lifestyle content.
